dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
dcterms:description: The popular VCTK dataset contains clean and noisy speech signals sampled at 48 KHz. The signals are resampled to 16 KHz in our experiments.
dcterms:title: VCTK Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
S. King
dcterms:description: The train data is constructed with clean speech signals of 28 speakers from the Voice Bank Corpus, including 14 male and 14 female speakers. There are about 400 utterances for each speaker.
dcterms:title: Voice Bank Corpus

dcterms:creator: N. I. J. Thiemann
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: The Demand Database consists of multichannel environmental noise recordings used to generate training data with various noise conditions.
dcterms:title: Demand Database
